name: AWS CLI
description: Installs the AWS CLI along with needed dependencies. Useful for base Dockerfiles that often are missing required install dependencies like gpg.

version.description: Select or enter an AWS CLI version.

installSam.description: Install the AWS SAM CLI (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/) via the specified method.

samVersion.description: SAM CLI version (https://github.com/aws/aws-sam-cli/releases). Only applicable if `installSam` is set to `standalone`.
